name: Quess
description: Quess passion for delivering exceptional services, augmented by proprietary digital platforms, has strongly established our credentials as India’s largest employer in the private sector and the biggest integrated business services provider in the country. With 500,000+ employees spread across 9 countries, we serve over 3,000 clients. We are proud to achieve this success as a 15-year old start-up. Quess offers managed outsourcing for sales, customer care, back office, telecom, manufacturing, facilities, security, HR, IT, and more.

enhanced_description: Quess is India's largest private sector employer and the biggest integrated business services provider, operating across 9 countries and serving over 3,000 clients with 500,000+ employees. Leveraging proprietary digital platforms and domain expertise, Quess enhances client productivity through managed outsourcing services. These services encompass a broad range of areas including sales, customer care, back office, telecom, manufacturing, facilities, security, HR, and IT. Specifically within HR, Quess provides end-to-end recruitment, general staffing, executive hiring, and onboarding solutions, underpinned by their focus on workforce management and global technology solutions for customization and future-readiness. The company aims to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity.
